text: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ’¡ Did you know that the energy crisis caused by the Ukraine invasion has had a negative impact on European firms' equity returns? ğŸ’°ğŸ“‰ According to a study by Ferriani and Gazzani, a one standard deviation increase in energy exposure is associated with a 0.9 percentage point reduction in European firms' returns. ğŸ“ŠğŸ’» This is due to Europe's heavy dependence on energy imports from Russia. ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ”Œ The study used data from Refinitiv and found that the impact of energy exposure on equity returns was particularly acute in Europe. ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ’¸ So, it's important to consider the energy factor when evaluating equity investments in Europe. ğŸ’¡ğŸ‘
